channel.title: Npc spawning command
channel.description:
can somone post his npc spawning command i messed up mine :D
end normal i just donwload another source thake it out but i am over my download limit
thx ~
supra

item.title: Npc spawning command
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:2, topic:251193”]Here you go ;).

[code] if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

                    if (newNPC >= 0) {
                        server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0),
                                heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10,
                                absX + -10, absY + -10, 1,
                                server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC),
                                false);
                        sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
                    } else {
                        sendMessage("No such NPC.");
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
                }
            }[/code][/quote]

ty

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawning command
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Here you go ;).

[code] if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

                    if (newNPC >= 0) {
                        server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0),
                                heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10,
                                absX + -10, absY + -10, 1,
                                server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC),
                                false);
                        sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
                    } else {
                        sendMessage("No such NPC.");
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
                }
            }[/code]
